statements.select: SELECT "UID", "Type", "Name", "T1", "T2", "T3", "T4", "T5", "Num", "L1", "L2", "L3", "L4", "L5", "S1", "S2", "S3", "S4", "S5" FROM PSP_Project_Sum
SELECT "UID", "Type", "Name", "T1", "T2", "T3", "T4", "T5", "Num", "L1", "L2", "L3", "L4", "L5", "S1", "S2", "S3", "S4", "S5" FROM PSP_Project_Sum WHERE UID = #UID#
SELECT "UID", "Type", "Name", "T1", "T2", "T3", "T4", "T5", "Num", "L1", "L2", "L3", "L4", "L5", "S1", "S2", "S3", "S4", "S5" FROM PSP_Project_Sum WHERE S1 = #S1# and S5 = #S5#
SELECT "UID", "Type", "Name", "T1", "T2", "T3", "T4", "T5", "Num", "L1", "L2", "L3", "L4", "L5", "S1", "S2", "S3", "S4", "S5" FROM PSP_Project_Sum WHERE S1 = #S1# and S5 = #S5# and Type = #Type#

SELECT "UID", "Type", "Name", "T1", "T2", "T3", "T4", "T5", "Num", "L1", "L2", "L3", "L4", "L5", "S1", "S2", "S3", "S4", "S5" FROM PSP_Project_Sum WHERE S1 = #S1# and S5 = #S5# and T1 = #T1# and T5 = #T5# and Type = #Type#

SELECT "UID", "Type", "Name", "T1", "T2", "T3", "T4", "T5", "Num", "L1", "L2", "L3", "L4", "L5", "S1", "S2", "S3", "S4", "S5" FROM PSP_Project_Sum WHERE S1 = #S1# and S5 = #S5# and T1 = #T1# and T2 = #T2# and T5 = #T5# and Type = #Type#

SELECT "UID", "Type", "Name", "T1", "T2", "T3", "T4", "T5", "Num", "L1", "L2", "L3", "L4", "L5", "S1", "S2", "S3", "S4", "S5" FROM PSP_Project_Sum WHERE S1 = #S1# and S5 = #S5# and T1 = #T1# and T2 = #T2# and T3 = #T3# and T5 = #T5# and Type = #Type#

SELECT "UID", "Type", "Name", "T1", "T2", "T3", "T4", "T5", "Num", "L1", "L2", "L3", "L4", "L5", "S1", "S2", "S3", "S4", "S5" FROM PSP_Project_Sum WHERE S1 = #S1# and S5 = #S5# and T5 = #T5# and T1 = #T1#

SELECT "UID", "Type", "Name", "T1", "T2", "T3", "T4", "T5", "Num", "L1", "L2", "L3", "L4", "L5", "S1", "S2", "S3", "S4", "S5" FROM PSP_Project_Sum WHERE S1 = #S1# and S5 = #S5# and T1 = #T1# and T5 = #T5#
SELECT "UID", "Type", "Name", "T1", "T2", "T3", "T4", "T5", "Num", "L1", "L2", "L3", "L4", "L5", "S1", "S2", "S3", "S4", "S5" FROM PSP_Project_Sum WHERE S1 = #S1# and S5 = #S5# and Type = #Type#
SELECT "UID", "Type", "Name", "T1", "T2", "T3", "T4", "T5", "Num", "L1", "L2", "L3", "L4", "L5", "S1", "S2", "S3", "S4", "S5" FROM PSP_Project_Sum WHERE S5 = #S5# order by S1,Type,Name
SELECT "UID", "Type", "Name", "T1", "T2", "T3", "T4", "T5", "Num", "L1", "L2", "L3", "L4", "L5", "S1", "S2", "S3", "S4", "S5" FROM PSP_Project_Sum WHERE S5 = $S5$ order by S1,Type,Name
SELECT "UID", "Type", "Name", "T1", "T2", "T3", "T4", "T5", "Num", "L1", "L2", "L3", "L4", "L5", "S1", "S2", "S3", "S4", "S5" FROM PSP_Project_Sum WHERE $str$
SELECT "UID", "Type", "Name", "T1", "T2", "T3", "T4", "T5", "Num", "L1", "L2", "L3", "L4", "L5", "S1", "S2", "S3", "S4", "S5" FROM PSP_Project_Sum WHERE S1 = #S1# and S5 = #S5# and L1 = #L1#

SELECT "UID", "Type", "Name", "T1", "T2", "T3", "T4", "T5", "Num", "L1", "L2", "L3", "L4", "L5", "S1", "S2", "S3", "S4", "S5" FROM PSP_Project_Sum WHERE S1 = #S1# and S5 = #S5# and L1 = #L1# and L2 = #L2#
SELECT "UID", "Type", "Name", "T1", "T2", "T3", "T4", "T5", "Num", "L1", "L2", "L3", "L4", "L5", "S1", "S2", "S3", "S4", "S5" FROM PSP_Project_Sum WHERE S1 = #S1# and S5 = #S5# and L1 = #L1#

SELECT "UID", "Type", "Name", "T1", "T2", "T3", "T4", "T5", "Num", "L1", "L2", "L3", "L4", "L5", "S1", "S2", "S3", "S4", "S5" FROM PSP_Project_Sum WHERE S1 = #S1# and T5 = #T5# and Name = #Name# and Type=#Type#
SELECT "UID", "Type", "Name", "T1", "T2", "T3", "T4", "T5", "Num", "L1", "L2", "L3", "L4", "L5", "S1", "S2", "S3", "S4", "S5" FROM PSP_Project_Sum WHERE Name = #Name# and S5 = #S5#
SELECT "Type" FROM PSP_Project_Sum WHERE $value$ group by Type ORDER BY Type DESC
SELECT "Name" FROM PSP_Project_Sum WHERE $value$ group by Name
SELECT "T5" FROM PSP_Project_Sum WHERE $value$ group by T5
SELECT "UID", "Type", "Name", "T1", "T2", "T3", "T4", "T5", "Num", "L1", "L2", "L3", "L4", "L5", "S1", "S2", "S3", "S4", "S5" FROM PSP_Project_Sum WHERE $value$
